title: Crowley in Good Omens Getting Sassy | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: the drunk scene is my ultimate fav, closest is the plants scene "GROW BETTAAAAAH"
Crowley Being Sassy For 4 Minutes Gay
Why do I emotionally relate with Crowley yowling "ETERNITYYYYYYYY"
Look at Amazon trying to be hip with the kids
I'm sorry but I'd like to politely ask why god- why sata- why SOMEBODY would you include the burning bookshop scene? WhY??? 😭😭😭
description:
Literally, just 4 minutes of Crowley from Good Omens being sassy and relatable. Okay, there's a little Aziraphale mixed in too. They're our favorite good angel/bad angel bromance! Watch Good Omens now, only on Amazon Prime.
